ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] /emote smacks self on head
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t worry about it... we were all newbies once. :) I ve been playing for almost 3 years and I m still a newbie, hehe. ... ===== ~~~~~~~~~ And on the eighth
ygData.messageBody:
Don't worry about it... we were all newbies once. :)
I've been playing for almost 3 years and I'm still a
newbie, hehe.

--- jstrackeicg <jstrackeicg@...> wrote:
> sorry for my previous post, went home at lunch and
> the first thing
> that pops up on my game is the helpfull tip of the
> day telling me to
> type /surname [name].
> Please pardon my newbie-syndrom. (i'm on new meds
> now to counteract
> this horrible disease.)
>
>


=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
http://home.comcast.net/~melanieroark
